Ralph Burton, a young African American, becomes trapped when the mine he is working in collapses. After several agonising days, he manages to free himself. When he makes it outside, he seems to be the only survivor of an apocalypse that the governments of the world have unleashed. This iconic sci-fi movie confronts racism and intolerance head on.
